original_text: And he sent by the hand of Nathan the prophet; and he called his name Jedidiah, because of the Lord.
korean_text: 선지자 나단을 보내 그의 이름을 여디디야라 하시니 이는 여호와께서 사랑하셨기 때문이더라

sentences.original_text: And he sent by the hand of Nathan the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 선지자 나단의 손을 통해 보내었고

sentences.original_text: and he called his name Jedidiah
